name: Model Scope
purpose: Alternative AI model hosting and distribution platform
description: Model Scope is an AI model hosting platform, primarily popular in Asian markets, that serves as an alternative to Hugging Face for distributing and accessing AI models. Wan 2.2 was released on both Hugging Face and Model Scope simultaneously, providing users with multiple download sources.

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Alternative source for downloading AI models
use_cases: Download Wan 2.2 models from alternative source
Access AI models in regions with better connectivity to Asian servers
Backup download source when Hugging Face is slow

strengths: Alternative download source for AI models
May have better speeds in certain regions
Supports same models as Hugging Face
limitations: Less popular than Hugging Face globally
